Mandala I.title: Hymn 1: Agni
Mandala I.subtitle: अग्निमीळे पुरोहितं
Mandala I.translation: Agni, the priest, the divine, the sacrificer, the bestower of wealth.

Mandala I.title: Hymn 2: Vayu
Mandala I.subtitle: वायवा याहि दर्शते
Mandala I.translation: Vayu, come for our sacrifice, you who are visible to all.

Mandala I.title: Hymn 3: Ashvins
Mandala I.subtitle: अश्विना यज्वरीरिषो
Mandala I.translation: Ashvins, accept our offering and grant us health.

Mandala II.title: Hymn 1: Agni
Mandala II.subtitle: अग्निं नरो दीधितिभिः
Mandala II.translation: Agni, praised by men with their thoughts.

Mandala III.title: Hymn 1: Agni
Mandala III.subtitle: अग्निं सुप्रतीकं सुमनस्यम्
Mandala III.translation: Agni, of beautiful face, of good mind.

Mandala IV.title: Hymn 1: Agni
Mandala IV.subtitle: अग्निं वः पातु सुष्टुतः
Mandala IV.translation: Agni, praised by you, may he protect us.

Mandala V.title: Hymn 1: Agni
Mandala V.subtitle: अग्निं वः पातु सुष्टुतः
Mandala V.translation: Agni, praised by you, may he protect us.

Mandala VI.subtitle: अग्निं वः पातु सुष्टुतः
